english.segment1: I am full of earth. You are heaven's worth. I am stained with dirt. Prone to depravity. You are everything that is bright and clean. The antonym of me. You are divinity. But a certain sign of grace is this: From the broken earth. Flowers come up pushing through the dirt
english.segment2: You are holy, holy, holy. All heaven cries "Holy, holy God.". You are holy, holy, holy. I want to be holy like you are
english.segment3: You are everything that is bright and clean. And your covering me with Your majesty. And the And the truest sign of grace was this: From wounded hands redemption fell down. Liberating man
english.segment4: . You are holy, holy, holy. All heaven cries "Holy, holy God.". You are holy, holy, holy. I want to be holy like you are
english.segment5: But the harder I try the more cleary can I feel. The depth of our fall and the weight of it all. And so this might could be the most impossible thing: Your grandness in me. Making me clean
english.segment6: Glory, hal-le-lu-jah. Glory, Glory, hal-le-lu-jah. So here I am. All of me. Finally everything
english.segment7: Wholly, wholly, wholly. I am wholly, wholly, wholly. I am wholly, wholly, wholly...Yours
english.segment8: I am full of earth and dirt and You
